pullrequest.title: Implement forward/backwards multi-step for log playback

content.raw: A part from this, the whole thing seems to work fine for me. I can send steps forwards/backwards and the behaviour is the expected. I was unable to make it fail. On big multisteps (-1000) it takes some seconds to update the simulation, something probably to handle at GUI level.
content.html: A part from this, the whole thing seems to work fine for me. I can send steps forwards/backwards and the behaviour is the expected. I was unable to make it fail. On big multisteps (-1000) it takes some seconds to update the simulation, something probably to handle at GUI level.
